title: So I'm getting pretty hype for Pokemon Sun and Moon
body:
The big reason for that is because of this adorable little bugger.
http://nintendoinquirer.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Pokemon-SunMoon-Starter-Rowlet.png

So i wanna hear what team you are on and just anything about the games that you want to talk about.

Edit: Yo we made it to the front page. First one of my posts to do so. You guys rock!

replies.body: https://completehistory.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/funny-god-pokemon-thought-malaria.jpg
Ahah, fond memories of wishing pokemon were real as a kid.
As a kid? As a 25 year old, I still wish Pokemon were real. I'm hype as fuck for Pokemon Go lol.
i'd just like to say pokemon go. less than 2 months
I still have a flip phone. FeelsFilpphoneMan

http://40.media.tumblr.com/27e4c7fa1379fb988cc6b22c201c372d/tumblr_mwceauMFvO1smc2kso9_500.jpg
this jsut, i must post it
To be fair, he does use a LOT of mana, especially if you are making use of his passive .__.
It's an outrageous build if you ask me.
https://media.giphy.com/media/pCO5tKdP22RC8/giphy.gif
I hated all the pokemans after orginal red and blue
I'm sorry to hear that. Gold and silver are some of the best games ever made. And the new games continue to deliver a fun high quality game experience.
Not the games, the pokemon. I kept playing them, but I just hacked in the original pokemon and played with those instead.

But but How can you hate that face.
https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwZNV340BfhUJbhzHzSyTMpN4ldW7rNPr64HVlEMVUBCt0h_fIqx_fCw
ITS JUST SO FREAKING CUTE.

I play since red, and when i saw this little bugger...

http://static.zerochan.net/Sewaddle.full.353916.jpg

holy shit \*w\*

let' s say each gen has its perks. I mean, not like Voltorb, magnemite and Grimer were much charismatic either.
Aww don't be that guy, because if you are you can't like the god of all Pokemon: Dunsparce.
https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTWoyCuwPVJeYQXHac_4C_QCszWvrGy3nHIhntK8z3451VIqm_c1meaF9I
https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSXUvaJqw6Tsq_Y8ri9n165l_tyJQk5BaKL-yvmgBbuNruvp1Dv

Real question what would be a good Pokémon game to start with?

I've honestly never tried one.

I have the new 3DS xl as well even x.x

> [{quoted}](name=Worst Mord NA,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sxkEvhLX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-24T14:25:58.222+0000)
>
> Real question what would be a good Pokémon game to start with?
> 
> I've honestly never tried one.
> 
> I have the new 3DS xl as well even x.x

XY are both good introductions to the Generation 6 mechanics and naturally leads into Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire which developed those mechanics a bit further.

If you don't mind backtracking to a previous gen, Black/White is a fantastic generation, my personal favorite to date.
soulsilver is the shit

If you want to get into the new games, go with X or Y. As for getting into the older games; try playing Diamond, Pearl, or Platinum. They have Pokemon contests like Ruby, Sapphire, and Emerald before them and they have a great storyline. It may just be blatant favouritism because I started with that generation, but I recommend it.
I love hg/ss, but imo they're some of the harder games in the series.
Bugsy's Scyther and Whitney's Miltank... oh and dont even ask how Falkner got a lv 14 Pidgeoto. Oh and Chuck's fucking Poliwrath... that game was BS and I loved it.

> that game was BS and I loved it.

Dude, I agree. Whitney screwed me over. Then again, Soul Silver is how I got my first female starter.
X or Y is a great place to start. Otherwise you can get the originals in the Eshop. Black and White are also wonderful starting places.
http://24.media.tumblr.com/e703f6cc055b717a6ed76b294611bc27/tumblr_mq5sxlTGmd1sruwido1_500.gif

If you're willing to go back in time a bit, HeartGold/SoulSilver are as good as any other game before or after. If you pick up anything for the 3DS before that you might not like the inferior graphics as much, but the 3DS titles are all amazing too.

Anyone else feel like pokemon Sun and Moon is why they did the {{champion:89}} and {{champion:131}} 
poll / battle thing recently?
Can we get trainer skins now?

I don't know how they would implement those, have them look enough like pokemon trainers too get the reference and not get in trouble for copyright infringement all at the same time, but yes. this needs to happen .__.
How about we cut out the middle man and get Poro Trainer skins.
Literally the first thing that came to mind when I saw it :P
I didn't but it's an interesting thought.
http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ma36fk6I111rngmtco1_500.gif
Its Litten {{summoner:14}}
http://imgur.com/gallery/f4HjAgD

I still think the best Pokemon is Emerald.

Feelsbadman, I stopped playing pokemon since black and white version. Life sucks and it is too much work to do, can't enjoy a game like that anymore.

It's alright there are plenty of games in the steam. But imma have to disagree with you and say Emerald was the worst pokemon just because of the insane difficulty spike. It's still a good game just a step below the rest.
You are playing POKEMON and you are complaining about the game being too hard? wat?

I'm saying from a game design prospective it was a very sudden jump in difficulty. It almost forces you to use a legendary and just brute force your way through everything or just spends hours grinding to make up for the level difference. Difficulty isn't a problem but when you go from casually easy to relatively challenging it really sours the game play experience.
Casually to me basically means use cheat for levels and stuff, because repeating the same procedure a billion times in 5 different generation of pokemon is definitely not fun.
Casual by definition is "relaxed and unconcerned" so something that doesn't take a whole lot of effort. It goes from like a 3/10 difficulty to a 7/10 just out of the blue.
Am i the only one who dislikes most of gen 1 Pokemon i honestly only liked a hand full of Pokemon from gen 1 or gen 2 i loved gen 3 and i like most of the Pokemon after.
You may be the only one and thats cool. You just can't hate chickorita. That is not allowed.
i said almost didnt like them all i fuckin love the kanto starters i just didnt like a lot of the other designs from it
Well chickorita is a Johto starter but at least you tried :)
i should tell you now im bad with names....of any kind it isnt just this....Cubone is one of my favorite pokemon

It's the saddest of pokemon. RIP in peace cumom
http://orig08.deviantart.net/2d43/f/2015/259/2/c/cubone_and_marowak_by_ninjendo-d99td86.png

you forgot yamask it literally morns its lost life 
http://pre04.deviantart.net/eaa9/th/pre/f/2013/209/a/e/yamask_by_anonymouswind-d6fkl0i.jpg
I was so expecting a leona diana joke, round of applause for not being predictable.
